title: Louis Vuitton Vernis Alma BB
description: Louis Vuitton Alma BB in Monogram-embossed brown Amarante Vernis leather (year 2012). Featuring smooth Vernis patent-calf trim, gold-toned hardware, double zip closure. The top opens to a brown textile-lined interior with flat pocket. Approximate dimensions: 24cm (L) x 16.5cm (H) x 11.5cm (D), 9cm handle drop, 56cm detachable strap drop. Accompanied by padlock, key, key bell and a LV dust bag. With Entrupy Certificate of Authenticity. (Pre-owned)
